Name: Black Gummi
Description: A Gummi that makes certain Pokemon drool in delight. Fills your belly by 5; 10; 15; 20; or 25; and increases your IQ by 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 depending on your type. Dark types love these!

Name: Blue Gummi
Description: A Gummi that makes certain Pokemon drool in delight. Fills your belly by 5; 10; 15; 20; or 25; and increases your IQ by 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 depending on your type. Water types love these!

Name: Yellow Gummi
Description: A Gummi that makes certain Pokemon drool in delight. Fills your belly by 5; 10; 15; 20; or 25; and increases your IQ by 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 depending on your type. Electric types love these!

Name: Violet Gummi
Description: A Gummi that makes certain Pokemon drool in delight. Fills your belly by 5; 10; 15; 20; or 25; and increases your IQ by 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 depending on your type. Fairy types love these!

Name: Wonder Gummi
Description: It has a curious texture unlike any other Gummi, never has the same taste twice... it's always delicious! Fills your belly by 25 and increases your IQ by 5, regardless of your type.

Name: Rainbow Gummi
Description: Absolute perfection in Gummi form. Don't look at it too long... Fills your belly by 50 and increases your IQ by 15, regardless of your type.

Name: Tiny Apple
Description: A very tiny Apple. Fills your belly by 25; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 1 if already full.

Name: Apple
Description: A juicy Apple. Fills your belly by 50; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 5 if already full.

Name: Big Apple
Description: A very fresh Big Apple! Fills your belly by 100; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 10 if already full.

Name: Huge Apple
Description: An Apple so big it takes 2 turns to eat! Fills your belly by 150; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 15 if already full!

Name: Perfect Apple
Description: Also known as Sekai Ichi. A pink Apple far too delicious for feeble minds to comprehend. Fills your belly by 200; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 20 if already full!

Name: Golden Apple
Description: It's one of the Golden Items. A Perfect Apple coated in a golden glow; far too precious and beautiful to even consider eating! It completely fills your Belly AND increases your maximum Belly Size by 50!

Name: Banana
Description: A rare; healthy Banana. Fills your belly by 50. Temporarily increases Belly Size by 10 if already full. Also has a 10% chance to raise your level by 1...

Name: Golden Banana
Description: It's one of the Golden Items. A mysterious Banana coated in a golden glow. So healthy... Fills your belly by 50. Temporarily increases Belly Size by 10 if already full; and increases your level by 5!

Name: Chestnut
Description: A Chestnut to peel open. Fills your belly by 50. Temporarily increases Belly Size by 5 if already full. Mankeys and Primeapes get +1 to all stats when eating this!

Name: Mini Donut
Description: A little diet Donut. Fills your belly by 25; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 1 if already full; and randomly; permanently increases one of your stats by 1.

Name: Donut
Description: A sugary Donut. Fills your belly by 50; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 1 if already full; and randomly; permanently increases one of your stats by 1... twice.

Name: Mega Donut
Description: A thick; round Donut! Fills your belly by 100; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 1 if already full; and randomly; permanently increases one of your stats by 1... thrice!

Name: Four-Leaf Cookie
Description: A fortune cookie. Fills your belly by 25; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 1 if already full; and randomly; permanently increases one of your stats by 1... a random number of times between 1 and 4!

Name: Sweet Chocolate
Description: Just objectively the best thing ever. Fills your belly by 25; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 1 if already full. Permanently increases all your stats by 1!

Name: Grimy Food
Description: Yuck. Fills your belly by 25; or temporarily increases Belly Size by 1 if already full. But you will get a random bad status condition!

Name: Geo Pebble
Description: When thrown; it flies high in an arc to clear obstacles and strike the target for 10 damage. It is not affected by Pierce or Long Toss and can be thrown at any angle.

Name: Gravelerock
Description: When thrown; it flies high in an arc to clear obstacles and strike the target for 20 damage. It is not affected by Pierce or Long Toss and can be thrown at any angle.

Name: Golestone
Description: When thrown; it flies high in an arc to clear obstacles and strike the target for 50 damage! It is not affected by Pierce or Long Toss and can be thrown at any angle.

Name: Gigali Rock
Description: When thrown; it flies high in an arc to clear obstacles and strike the target for 10 damage; and a 10% confusion chance. It is not affected by Pierce or Long Toss and can be thrown at any angle.

Name: Rare Fossil
Description: When thrown; it flies high in an arc to clear obstacles and strike the target for 100 damage! It is not affected by Pierce or Long Toss and can be thrown at any angle.

Name: Golden Fossil
Description: It's one of the Golden Items. A fossil somehow coated in a golden glow. When thrown; it flies high in an arc to clear obstacles and strike the target for 100 damage; and it never breaks! It is not affected by Pierce or Long Toss and can be thrown at any angle.

Name: A-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter A. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50.

Name: B-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter B. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50.

Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter V. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50.

Name: W-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter W. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50.

Name: X-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter X. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50.

Name: Y-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter Y. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50.

Name: Z-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter Z. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50.

Name: !-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter !. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 100!

Name: ?-Stone
Description: An odd stone similar to an Unown; shaped like the letter ?. When thrown; it flies in a straight line and damage with an attack power of 50; and deal a random status condition!

Name: Wooden Stick
Description: When thrown; it flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 10.

Name: Wooden Thorn
Description: When thrown; it flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 15.

Name: Wooden Spike
Description: When thrown; it flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 20.

Name: Leafy Twig
Description: A Wooden Stick; Thorn; or Spike that's been hit by a Grass Type move. It has sharp leaves. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 10; and hits nearby foes as well.

Name: Fiery Twig
Description: A Wooden Stick; Thorn; or Spike that's been hit by a Fire Type move. It has embers flying off. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 10; and inflicts a burn.

Name: Hydro Twig
Description: A Wooden Stick; Thorn; or Spike that's been hit by a Water Type move. It has a whirlpool around it. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 10; and sends flying.

Name: Iron Stick
Description: When thrown; it flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 30.

Name: Iron Thorn
Description: When thrown; it flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 40.

Name: Iron Spike
Description: When thrown; it flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 50.

Name: Corsola Twig
Description: A pointy twig. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 20; and a 30% flinch chance.

Name: Cacnea Spike
Description: A spiky spike. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 20; and a 60% flinch chance.

Name: Gold Fang
Description: A glossy fang. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 20; and causes flinching.

Name: Platinum Spike
Description: A mysterious; brightly glowing spike. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 100!

Name: Deci Arrow
Description: A sharp arrow. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 20; and never misses.

Name: Bronze Spike
Description: A spike crafted from bronze. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 30; and never breaks!

Name: Silver Spike
Description: A rare spike crafted from pure silver. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 40; and never breaks!

Name: Golden Spike
Description: It's one of the Golden Items. A brilliantly shining spike crafted from solid; glowing gold. When thrown; flies in a straight line and deals damage with an attack power of 50; and never breaks!

Name: Beauty Scarf
Description: A dressy fashion accessory. It evolves Feebas into Milotic.

Name: Coronet Rock
Description: A rock that radiates a peculiar energy, rumored only to exist on Mt. Coronet, a place that no one knows anything about. Evolves Magneton and Nosepass into Magnezone and Probopass respectively.

Name: Frozen Rock
Description: A stone that radiates deep chill, so it is easily mistaken for a chunk of ice. Evolves Eevee into Glaceon.

Name: Link Cable
Description: An intriguing cable used for linking unknown devices... Evolves Kadabra, Machoke, Graveler, Haunter, Boldore, and Gurdurr into Alakazam, Machamp, Golem, Gengar, Gigalith, and Conkeldurr respectively.

Name: Lunar Ribbon
Description: A ribbon filled with heartwarming moonlight energy. Evolves Eevee, Gligar, Sneasel, and Chingling into Umbreon, Gliscor, Weavile, and Chimecho respectively.

Name: Mossy Rock
Description: A stone covered in lush moss that exudes the vitality of plants. It evolves Eevee into Leafeon.

Name: Sun Ribbon
Description: A ribbon infused with heartwarming sunshine energy. It evolves Eevee, Budew, Happiny, and Riolu into Espeon, Roselia, Chansey, and Lucario respectively.

Name: Deep Sea Scale
Description: A pretty scale that shines faintly. It evolves Clamperl into Gorebyss.

Name: Deep Sea Tooth
Description: A supersharp fang with a subtle gleam. It evolves Clamperl into Huntail.

Name: Dragon Scale
Description: A thick, tough, hydrodynamic scale. It evolves Seadra into Kingdra.

Name: Dubious Disc
Description: An enigmatic disc that overflows with dubious data... It evolves Porygon2 into Porygon-Z.

Name: Dusk Stone
Description: An odd stone with a mesmerizing darkness. It evolves Murkrow, Misdreavus, and Lampent into Honchkrow, Mismagius, and Chandelure respectively.

Name: Electirizer
Description: A box full of a massive amount of electric energy. It evolves Electabuzz into Electivire.

Name: Fire Stone
Description: A peculiar orange stone that radiates warmth like a flame. It evolves Vulpix, Growlithe, Eevee, and Pansear into Ninetales, Arcanine, Flareon, and Simisear respectively.

Name: King's Rock
Description: An impressive, rocky crown that conveys a kingly nobility. It evolves Poliwhirl and Slowpoke into Politoed and Slowking respectively.

Name: Leaf Stone
Description: A peculiar stone inscribed with a leafy pattern. It evolves Gloom, Weepinbell, Exeggcute, Nuzleaf, and Pansage into Vileplume, Victreebel, Exeggutor, Shiftry, and Simisage respectively.

Name: Magmarizer
Description: A box brimming with a huge amount of magma energy. It evolves Magmar into Magmortar.

Name: Metal Coat
Description: A misterious substance full of a special filmy metal. It evolves Onix and Scyther into Steelix and Scizor respectively.

Name: Moon Stone
Description: An odd stone that gleams like the moon in the evening sky. It evolves Nidorina, Nidorino, Clefairy, Jigglypuff, Skitty, and Munna into Nidoqueen, Nidoking, Clefable, Wigglytuff, Delcatty, and Musharna respectively.

Name: Oval Stone
Description: A surprisingly smooth, round, egg shaped stone. It evolves Happiny into Chansey.

Name: Protector
Description: A heavy, durable piece of protective equipment. It evolves Rhydon into Rhyperior.

Name: Razor Claw
Description: A wickedly sharp claw perfect for raking foes. It evolves Sneasel into Weavile.

Name: Razor Fang
Description: A savagely sharp, piercing fang. It evolves Gligar into Gliscor.

Name: Reaper Cloth
Description: An eerie cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It evolves Dusclops into Dusknoir.

Name: Shiny Stone
Description: An odd stone that shines with dazzling light. It evolves Togetic, Roselia, and Minccino into Togekiss, Roserade and Cinccino.

Name: Sun Stone
Description: An odd stone that glows with sunny warmth. It evolves Gloom, Sunkern, Cottonee, and Petilil into Bellossom, Sunflora, Whimsicott, and Lilligant.

Name: Thunder Stone
Description: A peculiar stone with a thunderbolt pattern, gives a zap everytime you grab it. It evolves Pikachu and Eevee into Raichu and Jolteon.

Name: Upgrade
Description: A mysterious device filled with all sorts of important updates. It evolves Porygon into Porygon2.

Name: Water Stone
Description: A peculiar stone that holds the color of clearest blue. It evolves Poliwhirl, Shellder, Staryu, Eevee, Lombre, and Panpour into Poliwrath, Cloyster, Starmie, Vaporeon, Ludicolo, and Simipour respectively.

Name: Cheering Flag
Description: Raises the power of nearby teammates' moves by 33%, but not the holder's.

Name: Clarity Flag
Description: Protects teammates from being confused, but not the holder.

Name: Immunity Flag
Description: Protects teammates from being poisoned, but not the holder.

Name: Insomnia Flag
Description: Protects teammates from sleeping, but not the holder.

Name: Limber Flag
Description: Protects teammates from being paralyzed, but not the holder.

Name: Resilient Flag
Description: Protects teammates from stat drops, but not the holder.

Name: Tough Flag
Description: Allows teammates to survive a move that would KO them with 1 HP, but not the holder.

Name: Bug Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Bug type connection.

Name: Dark Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Dark type connection.

Name: Dragon Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Dragon type connection.

Name: Electric Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to an Electric type connection.

Name: Fighting Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Fighting type connection.

Name: Fire Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Fire type connection.

Name: Flying Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Flying type connection.

Name: Ghost Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Ghost type connection.

Name: Grass Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Grass type connection.

Name: Ground Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Ground type connection.

Name: Ice Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to an Ice type connection.

Name: Normal Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Normal type connection.

Name: Poison Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Poison type connection.

Name: Psychic Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Psychic type connection.

Name: Rock Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Rock type connection.

Name: Steel Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Steel type connection.

Name: Water Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Water type connection.

Name: Fairy Gift
Description: May contain a rare item, but only if gifted to a Fairy type connection.

Name: Premier Gift
Description: May contain an exceptionally rare item, but only if gifted to a Legendary or Mythical connection!

Name: Sky Gift
Description: May contain an exceptionally rare item, but only if shipped to a connection from the Shaymin Village!

Name: Alert Specs
Description: Antitheft specs that prevent the Pokémon from having its held item snatched away or swatted down.

Name: Goggle Specs
Description: High field of view specs that reveal hidden traps, Pokemon, and stairs to the holder.

Name: Gold Scope
Description: Golden scopes that scan for any hidden Gold Bars or Golden Items hidden in the floor.

Name: Insomniscope
Description: Psychedelic glasses that prevent Sleep, Yawning, Napping, or having a Nightmare.

Name: Lock-On Specs
Description: Specs with a built in HUD that makes thrown items never miss.

Name: No-Con Specs
Description: Lookalike of Lock-On Specs, with a defective HUD that makes thrown items fly in random directions!

Name: Scope Lens
Description: Thermal lens that increases the holder's Crit chance by +1.

Name: Whiff Specs
Description: Modified Lock-On Specs that allow the holder to throw items without hitting anyone. There must be a use case for this...

Name: X-Ray Specs
Description: Powerful, wall scanning specs that make all Pokemon and Items fully visible on the map, but not tiles or stairs.
